name: Surrounded (itch) (Maniac)
description:
Trailer

This was made in 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 by Maniac. All assets(yes the beans) were seriously made by me (yeah I'm surprised to lol ). Show support by following me and subscribing to my Youtube channel.

Move - WASD, Spacebar and Mouse

Switch between players - 1, 2 and 3

Red player power - Left click

Menu - M
